memberdef.name: ssh_hmac_tab
memberdef.initializer: = { { "hmac-sha1", SSH_HMAC_SHA1, false }, { "hmac-sha2-256", SSH_HMAC_SHA256, false }, { "hmac-sha2-512", SSH_HMAC_SHA512, false }, { "hmac-md5", SSH_HMAC_MD5, false }, { "aead-poly1305", SSH_HMAC_AEAD_POLY1305, false }, { "aead-gcm", SSH_HMAC_AEAD_GCM, false }, { "hmac-sha1-etm@openssh.com", SSH_HMAC_SHA1, true }, { "hmac-sha2-256-etm@openssh.com", SSH_HMAC_SHA256, true }, { "hmac-sha2-512-etm@openssh.com", SSH_HMAC_SHA512, true }, { "hmac-md5-etm@openssh.com", SSH_HMAC_MD5, true }, { NULL, 0, false } }
